criteria.details: Score: 0.00 - The response does not identify that Operating Cash Flow is missing the adjustment for finance costs, net. This is a core structural error and is completely absent from the analysis.
Score: 0.00 - The analyst failed to identify the rogue -10 value in cell K32 of the FS Calcs sheet. No mention of unintended hardcoded values or data integrity issues was made.

Score: 0.00 - The response does not note that PPE including leases (row 66) is missing from the balance sheet roll-forward in row 70. This omission directly contributes to the balance sheet not tying and was not addressed.
